message: Just curious as to which of the two you guys prefer
I've never heard of Prowl, but I've been using Boxcar for the past 6 months.
I like Boxcar, but it no longer works with Growl for me. So I should try Prowl.
Boxcar. Awesome for following twitter replies
@iphoneincanada Twitter for iPhone can give you notifications. Why Boxcar?
@anildigital Boxcar has more options and keeps a complete history of all the notifications.
